00015 /* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
00016  * Base class for automatic event generator configuration/initialisation.  *
00017  * Derived objects may be used to create and initialise event generator    *
00018  * instances.                                                              *
00019  *                                                                         *
00020  * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * */
00021 
00022 #include <Camgen/static_conf.h>
00023 #include <Camgen/ps_cut.h>
00024 #include <Camgen/ps_gen_base.h>
00025 #include <Camgen/scale_expr.h>
00026 
00027 namespace Camorra
00028 {
00029     template<class model_t>class generator_configuration: public phase_space_cut,
00030                                                           public scale_expression<typename model_t::value_type>,
00031                                                           public ps_generator_viewer<model_t>
00032     {
00033         public:
00034 
00035             typedef model_t model_type;
00036             typedef typename ps_generator_viewer<model_t>::momentum_type momentum_type;
00037             typedef typename momentum_type::value_type value_type;
00038             typedef typename momentum_type::size_type size_type;
00039             typedef typename ps_generator_viewer<model_t>::spacetime_type spacetime_type;
00040             typedef helicity_generators::type helicity_generator_tag;
00041             typedef colour_generators::type colour_generator_tag;
00042             typedef initial_states::type initial_state_tag;
00043             typedef phase_space_generators::type ps_generator_tag;
00044 
00045             generator_configuration(){}
00046 
00047             virtual void configure()=0;
00048     };
00049 
00050 }
